name: Slack_CreateChannel
author: Fabien Bloume, StrangeBee
description: Creates a Slack channel for a TheHive case, invites participants, and optionally posts a case summary and description.

configurationItems.name: slack_token
configurationItems.description: Slack Bot Token used for API authentication.

configurationItems.name: participants
configurationItems.description: List of email addresses to invite as default participants.

configurationItems.name: channel_prefix
configurationItems.description: Prefix to use for the Slack channel name. By default, 'case-'

configurationItems.name: thehive_base_url
configurationItems.description: Base URL of TheHive instance to include a case link.

configurationItems.name: post_summary
configurationItems.description: Include a case summary in the initial Slack message.

configurationItems.name: post_description
configurationItems.description: Include the case description in the initial Slack summary message.
